A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I don't know what movie the people who wrote horrible reviews watched\, but it wasn't this one. The best acting in any Star Wars movie\, with the possible exception of Rogue One. Every scene was unpredictable\,  well written and nearly perfect. Yes\, there were corny  jokes... It's Star Wars! Yes\, it took the series in new directions. I enjoyed them all! What is wrong with you people?
